Package assignment

Class Order

java.lang.Object
assignment.Order
public class Order extends Object
Stores all the order details pertain in a single customer
Author:
Admin

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Order​(Customer customer, int tableID, String staffName)
    Instantiates the order object Adds the first item to the order before prompting for other updates

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addOrderItem()
    Displays all the menuitems in Menu, gets the menuItem desired from user to create an itemorder If menuitem already chosen in order, the quantity will be added to the current item order.

    Changes quantity of selected ItemOrder

      public void updateOrder()

    • addOrderItem

      public void addOrderItem()
      Displays all the menuitems in Menu, gets the menuItem desired from user to create an itemorder If menuitem already chosen in order, the quantity will be added to the current item order.
